# this page is information about me.

My Name is Yiming Li. I'm currently a first year master student at [Columbia University in the City of New York](https://www.columbia.edu/), mailman school of public health. My department is biostatistics. I finished my undergraduate study in [Fudan university](https://www.fudan.edu.cn/en/), Shanghai, China with bachelors degree of mathematics. 

I have a strong interest in data analysis using mathematics methods such as PCA, SVM. And I also want to study deep learning and machine learning.

More details about my experience can be found in my [resume](resume.pdf)
